text: Noah Cyrus wasn't going to let a bit of rain or hail ruin her big night. The 17 - year - old sister of Miley Cyrus incorporated a bit of her sister's colorful stage show and risk - taking style as she performed at the MTV Movie and TV Awards on a hailing, rain - soaked day in Los Angeles Sunday. Noah took the stage at the Shrine Auditorium to perform her single Stay Together clad in a white tracksuit with Ruff Neck emblems, with a black mesh top over a bando and black boots, as she was flanked by backup dancers in yellow shirts.
